title: Workshop on Design Thinking-Based STEAM Mathematics Learning Activity Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic mathematical concepts and fundamental principles of STEAM education
context.additional_context: Instructional competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. A practice-oriented course utilizing mobile-based microlearning in BYOD environments for elementary, middle, and high school in-service teachers and pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design STEAM mathematics learning activities for real-life problem-solving by applying the design thinking process.
Learners can develop learner-engaged mathematics activity scenarios using collaborative tools.
Learners can produce microlearning materials executable in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
